org.jwave.model.playlist

Interface Playlist

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ESource<java.lang.Integer>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlaylistImpl

    public interface Playlist
extends ESource<java.lang.Integer>
    A playlist is a collection of Song.

      • moveSongToPosition

        void moveSongToPosition(int songToMoveID,
                        int position)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Moves the selected song in a new position.
        Parameters:
        songToMoveID - the song to be moved.
        position - the new position index.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the new position is out of playlist borders.

      • removeFromPlaylist

                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        Parameters:
        songID - the songs to be removed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the playlist doesn't contain the id.
